    A little about us

    1CapApp started when two seasoned captioners put their wish list together for they wanted from a text streaming platform. What was currently available was way too expensive and did not satisfy their needs. Furthermore, they didnâ€™t foresee the currently available applications providing their needed functionality any time soon and they had customers begging for more features.

    After finding a highly talented developer and a couple of years of development and testing 1CapApp was born.

    The two founders and our developers have created an easy to use, full featured text streaming platform that just looks and feels nice. At right is our Admin Home page and Streaming Text view Page.
